tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  update_description TEXT,
  update_date DATE,
  recipient_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE team_notifications (
	notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_member_id INT,
	notification_message VARCHAR(255),
	notification_type VARCHAR(50),
	send_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (member_id INT PRIMARY KEY, member_name VARCHAR(255), email_address VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(15))
CREATE TABLE ProjectUpdates (update_id INT PRIMARY KEY, update_title VARCHAR(255), update_description TEXT, update_date DATE, project_id INT)

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    deadline DATE,
    project_manager INT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES ProjectUpdates(update_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES TeamMembers(member_id)
);
